summary: Project now includes deploying/publishing the app to a stable live domain and providing a live URL to the user.

existing_features.title: Deploy the existing app as a production (non-preview) Internet Computer deployment and capture the final stable HTTPS URL that users can open in a browser.
Update frontend/DEPLOYMENT.md to include complete, copy-pastable steps to deploy to the Internet Computer mainnet and to retrieve/confirm the final live HTTPS URL after deployment.

new_feature_requests.summary: Publish/deploy the app to a stable live domain and provide the live URL

projectName: Publish the app to a stable live Internet Computer URL and provide the final HTTPS link
